Package org.apache.lucene.benchmark.byTask.tasks

Class WarmTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.benchmark.byTask.tasks.PerfTask
      • org.apache.lucene.benchmark.byTask.tasks.ReadTask
        • org.apache.lucene.benchmark.byTask.tasks.WarmTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    public class WarmTask
extends ReadTask
    Warm reader task: retrieve all reader documents.

    Note: This task reuses the reader if it is already open. Otherwise a reader is opened at start and closed at the end.

    Other side effects: counts additional 1 (record) for each retrieved (non null) document.
